description: Non-Material Amendment application to Outline Planning Permission ref: P041261 allowed on appeal ref: APP/V5570/A/07/2051902 dated 22 July 2008. The amendments comprise: revised Parameter Plans TS004 and TS005 to show residential area/void space in lieu of retail on the York Way frontage to Building W1 and revised wording to the associated condition 17; and amended wording within the Revised Development Specification (August 2005) to allow entrance canopies to overhang the development zone boundaries in the same way as balconies.
